songs.title: Str8 Rider
songs.lyrics:
Str8 rider
I’m  a Str8 rider
Ima  Ima Ima Ima
Ima Str8
Ima Str8 rider
Ima  Str8 rider

Bitch ain’t you  rolling for regal
Cut me some lowers some smokers
Stress the homies
To blow and some stomies
For regal
Roll me some smokes
Stressed the homies
To blow and the promise to doties
Niggas till I found out
They was phony
All of my niggas better
?
These niggas don’t want to know me
I ride with  bang on a cable
And I ain’t seen the face
But it got a name
On that nigga
And lady said get him
So I murdered that nigga
I’m like fuck them other niggas
Cause I ride with the realest
You know the really
Beef it isn’t working
My status
Beat you perfect
In this rap game
I’m murky
My attitude
Dude like fucking no shame
And it’s getting in my gubbie
We smoking out in public
You hater
Bitch stop; it
I;m tired
I was raised in the city
Grew up listening to Eazy
Rapping gangs making it look eee
That’s my motto
For gonner these bitches
Make it harder for a thug
You niggas chopping some muffins
I’m riding straight
Until my heart stop

Baby gangsta
I’m a hub city
Mongo
Ima jump; on this pogo
All my teachers are polo
Ima keep all the heat
I don’t pose for no photo
Unless a glock is involved
And I don’t run from no conflict
Unless the cops are involved
And if it ain’t for my kids
Then I ain’t breaking no bread
Cause if you looking for dollars
Bitch I ain’t taking no head
And if you ain’t about chips
Then you can get off my dick

Cause I’m a hustling motherfucker
Keep some money to flip
What the streets say
The sheets I cream so bitch big
I ain’t losing ain’t no snoozing
You hear me ? but don’t sleep
When it’s time to take out
I’m a rider it’s four deep
Even if I trip
Niggas all on a bitch
That’s all on me
I’m a G
Like my big homie E
I run deep
When a rhyme does open my eyes
The money’s all I see
Cause I swinging
Now my phone
It’s ringing
They calling me
But I’m a RIDER/PIMP
